bibl.author: W. A. Field
bibl.title: W. A. Field to Henry Van Aernam, 9 June 1869

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I am directed by the Attorney General to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of this date, requesting a list of the names and residences of the various officers of the Circuit and District Courts of the U. S.—and to say, in reply, that a list of such officers of those Courts as are under the supervision of this office, has been furnished to the Secretary of the Interior, to whom you are respectfully referred.
